title: Subtle Golden Kamal Studs - Modern Mokappu for the Discerning Eye
materials: Emerald. Crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Delicate floral design inspired by the lotus flower (Kamal), with a central emerald accent. Embellished with shimmering brilliant-cut CZ stones in a pavé setting. The lightweight, comfortable design makes these studs perfect for daily wear.
colors: Golden yellow with sparkling white CZ stones and a vibrant green emerald center.
occasions: casual celebrations. Suitable as a gift for any occasion
description: These elegant studs offer a modern twist on traditional South Indian jewelry. The radiant gold and sparkling CZ stones enhance any outfit. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable, all-day wear. Perfect for those who appreciate subtle yet elegant designs.
